hi i m not getting audio on my machine so can u tell me what to do?? while opening the volume control its says that No volume control elements and/or devices found
did you see if your sound card was supported?
how to check that??

look for alsa, and look at the supported sound cards.
plz tell me..
I don't know...
you have to look...
i got this result while checking for ALSA in Multimedia system selector Failed to construct test pipeline for 'ALSA - Advanced Linux Sound Architecture'
then your alsa is broken....
So what to do to fix that??
reinstall alsa?
it looks like you've got a broken package or an unsupported card.
